events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The case has been categorized under the Refund cluster based on customer request for money back.
An agent has been assigned to handle the refund request and follow up with the customer.
Hello, I’m sorry to hear about the issue with your order. I’m here to help you process your refund.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify?
Here is my order number 789456123 and attached is a picture showing the item I received, which is incorrect.
Thank you for the info. We will process your full refund within 3 business days and send confirmation once done.
Thanks for the quick response and refund offer, I appreciate the help resolving this issue.
The refund has been processed successfully, and you should see the amount credited in your account shortly.
We wanted to check in and ensure that you have received your refund and that there are no further issues.
Since the refund was confirmed received and no further questions were raised, we are closing this case now.
